title: Addition of ExponentialFamily
body_html:
This adds ExponentialFamily. ExponentialFamily uses concepts of Bregman divergence of the log normalizers of distributions to compute entropy and KL-divergences.

For distributions belonging to an exponential family, this PR adds tests to check implementations of entropy and KL-Divergence functions with both the Monte Carlo and Bregman divergences.

Joint work with @fritzo . Math checked and approved by @fritzo .

This adds ExponentialFamily. ExponentialFamily uses concepts of Bregman divergence of the log normalizers of distributions to compute entropy and KL-divergences.
For distributions belonging to an exponential family, this PR adds tests to check implementations of entropy and KL-Divergence functions with both the Monte Carlo and Bregman divergences.
Joint work with @fritzo . Math checked and approved by @fritzo .
body:
This adds `ExponentialFamily`. `ExponentialFamily` uses concepts of Bregman divergence of the log normalizers of distributions to compute entropy and KL-divergences.

For distributions belonging to an exponential family, this PR adds tests to check implementations of entropy and KL-Divergence functions with both the Monte Carlo and Bregman divergences.

Joint work with @fritzo . Math checked and approved by @fritzo .
